title: You and a champion share a B-day party
body:
You and a champion that was released on your Birthday share a B-day party.  Who is it with and what's the party like?

I was looking on LOLking the other night and I noticed {{champion:78}} and I have the same birthday.  We get go wild,  running around ramming around a bunch of stuff Saints Row style, tear the town up, and use Diplomatic Immunity to get out of any problems.  Hurray for being a Diplomat's entourage.   ;)

replies.body:
According to lolking, I have the same birthday as {{champion:134}} . We'd go balls-deep.

http://img.mogicons.com/l/if-you-know-what-i-mean-127.png
http://i.imgur.com/U3agULu.png

I share my birthday with her aswell 
She could put all her balls in me. (is that gay?)
So long as it's a mutual event, no.
You'll have a ball.
Silly goose, Syndra has at least 3.
She's got a lot of balls.
Shes got more balls than me!
{{champion:8}} and I have the same b-day.. It would be a bloodbath! Mwhaha!!! >:D ..jk :T Probably play league and *suck at life*.. :P
June 6th - Draaaaaven! {{item:3137}}{{champion:119}}{{item:3139}}
Sona's birthday is a day before mine, but that's about as close as it gets! (I'm totally okay with that, though, 'cause she's one of my mains!)

I am closest to {{champion:106}} . We'd run around in a thunderstorm biting the hell out of an unnamed Chronokeeper who doesn't belong in this game... I'm looking at you {{champion:26}} . Your time has run out, Chronokeeper.
Well, good that you have a plan.  And yeah, he's annoying.
You can never really run out of time as zilean.

No champions released on my birthday :(

These ones were all released the same month though:

{{champion:84}} 2010-05-10
{{champion:90}} 2010-05-31
{{champion:67}} 2011-05-10
{{champion:122}} 2012-05-22
{{champion:201}} 2014-05-07

Darius is the closest. Maybe we could have a giant birthday month party. I don't know how all these champions would get along though.
---
{{champion:21}}

> No champions released on my birthday :(
> 
> These ones were all released the same month though:
> 
> {{champion:84}} 2010-05-10
> {{champion:90}} 2010-05-31
> {{champion:67}} 2011-05-10
> {{champion:122}} 2012-05-22
> {{champion:201}} 2014-05-07
> 
> Darius is the closest. Maybe we could have a giant birthday month party. I don't know how all these champions would get along though.
> ---
> {{champion:21}}

Uh, I think you have {{champion:84}} 's release date wrong.

I copied the dates directly out of the [official timeline](http://timeline.leagueoflegends.com/). 

And here is [a link to the official release post](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=110073). May 10, 2010.

---
{{champion:21}}

{{champion:84}} 
Hellooo nurse, am I right?
Hellooo Nurse!
I share my birthday with no champions, the closest one however is literally my favorite champion{{champion:266}} . Released on the 13th of June. He was 2 days away.
Omg i just realized i have the same birthday as {{champion:157}} No wonder i like him. We'll be drinking sake together and listening to calm melody as yasuo plays his flute.
Cheers!

Alistar, Annie, Ashe, Fiddlesticks, Jax, Kayle, Master Yi, Morgana, Nunu, Ryze, Sion, Sivir, Soraka, Teemo, Tristana, Twisted Fate, and Warwick. 

There's no way in hell I survive that bday party.
No, but that'd be a pretty epic way to go.

No one released on my birthday, but {{champion:236}} was released one day after, so... looks like there aren't gonna be any undeads at our party. Shame... I was really looking forward to having pony rides.

{{champion:119}} 
We would put on one helluva show.

I don't share my b-day with anyone {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}. (February 28th)
But;
Lots of champs have released on 21th February (Maybe game?)
{{champion:82}} (My first mid laner) has released on 24 February, same as my mom's b-day :D
{{champion:59}}({{champion:102}} 's best friend) and {{champion:133}} (I wanna main her) has released 1 day after my b-day (March 1st)
{{champion:161}}(I have a hunger about knowledge like him) has released 1 day befeore my b-day (27th February)
BONUS:
{{champion:102}} (My fav top laner)'s price was lovered to 4800 IP 1 day before my b-day.
You silly duck, February 29th is every four years not 28th.
This is why I can't have nice things.
What happened?
i don't share a birthday with any champions yet {{champion:32}}
Amumu feels your pain.
LOL, me and {{champion:120}}  have the same birthday!  He was actually going to be the next champ i was going to buy. I MUST MAIN HIM!!
Interesting what you'll learn if you look.

According to lolking, the closest ones are {{champion:115}} and {{champion:43}} . So me and {{champion:115}} should be careful where we stick our balls into before {{champion:43}} strikes at us. But before that happens me and {{champion:115}} will have a blast.
Apparently I have the same birthday as riven so I have no idea how this will turn out.
It would be a hopping good time I'd imagine.

My birthday is one day before {{champion:161}}  birthday... close enough right? Kinda worried he'd attempt to light the candles on our cake with his laser and end up burning a hole through my TV, wall, house, family......
Lasers are all good fun until the burn down your house and kill your family.

interesting {{champion:133}}  is the closest to mine being 3 day later than {{champion:133}}  
the B Day
Probably be alot of strategy intellectual talking.
Maybe abit of hunting or archery contest fun
{{champion:112}}  is the closest to mine, off by one day. Followed by{{champion:254}} and {{champion:103}}. Thank god i dont really celebrate birthdays.
{{champion:58}} and {{champion:113}} ,i'm not like those 2 at all :D
{{champion:84}} , but {{champion:201}}  and {{champion:67}}  are insanely close... I honestly have no clue what would happen...

Sharing a B-day with Lissandra is Pretty Cool.
Also I share a B-day with an entire game mode.
Suck it nerds!
{{champion:131}}  and {{champion:38}}. You will fear us!

{{champion:37}} is the only one closest to my B-day, mine being 9/22 and hers 9/20. It would be nice and relaxing, we'd just play music together, me on my guitar or drums and her on her etwahl. I'm naturally a quiet, speak only when I have to, sort of person, and since I don't like talking to other people most of the time, with the exception of myself (I just can't stop talking to myself, no matter how hard I try) I don't even have to talk to Sona cause of the whole mute thing going on. So music being the only thing heard with the not talking (the song Enjoy the Silence comes to mind), I think Sona and I are quite a good pair. Not to mention that hair and she's in a metal band \m/ <3 \m/ I would be fine with just headbanging with her (and flirting from time to time, cause even though we wouldn't have to talk, I'd still feel the need to compliment her occasionally, but that would just be a one-way thing for the most part).

I probably put more than enough thought into it, but whatever.

I don't share a B-day with any champions. The closest champions to my B-day are {{champion:79}} and{{champion:80}} with a 5 day difference (Gragas and Pantheon; 2/2. Me; 2/7). If I had a B-day party with either of them it would just suck for me. I honestly can't see me and Pantheon doing anything other than baking and cooking, but I ain't got time for that. And I just know that a B-day party will just suck for me because I am not old enough to drink alcoholic beverages (2 years too young) and I don't plan on to ever in my life.

Hmm this reminds me of this.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7aYPU4uBZSM
Yorick's is a day off of mine. D:
